name: Botanical Garden Tour
description:
The Botanical Garden Tour takes you safely through the artfully preserved colonial town of Puerto Vallarta along the coast,  into the Sierra Madre Mountains to Puerto Vallarta’s renowned Botanical Gardens………

Riding along the scenic Malecon by the shore, you’ll get a glimpse of the city’s famous contemporary bronze sculptures and witness its vibrant culture. Riding  through town, you’ll see Puerto Vallarta’s rich display of shops, restaurants and Mexican vendors.
